laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: CT-guided percutaneous left lower quadrant abscess drainage
laboratory_examinations.findings: 5.2 x 4.5 cm left lower quadrant abscess containing gas and fluid adjacent to the sigmoid colon. The sigmoid colon wall is thickened. Inflammatory changes involve the surrounding fat.
BACTEROIDES FRAGILIS GROUP detected; reference range is 10.4 - 13.4.
